sources.note: ONC mandatory disclosures for OrthoplexEMR V1. Confirms it was developed by Proactive Technology Management for Mendelson Kornblum, no plans for sale. Lists required dependencies: MDToolbox, EMRDirect, e-IMO, SMTP. Lists all certified criteria and CQMs.

EHI export documentation. Describes C-CDA-based export with 16 clinical data sections including demographics, encounters, medications, problems, allergies, vitals, care team, immunizations, social history, medical equipment, test results, procedures, goals, health concerns, and treatment plans.

Main website for Synergy Health Partners (formerly Mendelson Kornblum). mendelsonortho.com redirects here. Patient-facing marketing site describing musculoskeletal care services. No mention of EMR or technology.
Company history page. Founded 1963 by Dr. Herbert Mendelson, expanded into Synergy Health Partners as a vertically integrated musculoskeletal care system with clinics, MRI centers, ASCs, and PT/OT.
About page. Describes Synergy Health Partners as Michigan's only integrated musculoskeletal care provider. 20+ physicians, multiple locations across Southeast Michigan.
Website for Proactive Technology Management, the company that built OrthoplexEMR. Small managed IT services company in Bingham Farms, MI serving SMBs. No mention of OrthoplexEMR on the main site.
Proactive's healthcare IT services page. Mentions HIPAA compliance, EMR/EHR support (for Epic, Allscripts, Meditech), medical device integration. No mention of OrthoplexEMR or custom EMR development.
Dr. Ben Mayo's practice page describing MKO. Confirms nearly 60 years of operation, multiple SE Michigan locations, services include orthopedics, PT, pain management, and MRI.
Terms of use for patient portal. Confirms MKO owns the application. Minimal detail on portal features â€” mostly legal terms.

Bio of Michael Weinberger (co-founder of Proactive Technology Management). Confirms he built OrthoplexEMR for multi-specialty orthopedic groups and has expertise in medical billing, scheduling, and credentialing systems. Also CTO at both Synergy Health Partners MSO and Schechter Wealth.
ZoomInfo listing for Jurgen Jansen as IT Project Manager at SynergyHealth. He is the CHPL contact for OrthoplexEMR.
LinkedIn page for Synergy Health Partners MSO, LLC (listed under MKOSS handle). Confirms organizational identity.
Patient intake portal for Mendelson Kornblum. Exists as a separate web application from the main OrthoplexEMR login, suggesting intake/registration may be a distinct system component.
OrthoplexEMR login page. Confirms the EMR is web-accessible at orthoplex.mkoss.com.
Trinity Health Michigan listing for MKO location, indicating some affiliation or referral relationship with the Trinity Health system.
